title: PM directs giving maximum relief to down-trodden
content:
LAHORE, Oct 22 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Friday directed the Punjab government to take all possible measures to give maximum relief to the down-trodden segments of society.
The prime minister expressed these views as he met Punjab Minister for Baitul Maal Syed Yawar Abbas Bukhari during his day-long visit to Lahore.
The prime minister was briefed on various welfare projects of Baitul Maal.
Chief Minister Punjab Sardar Usman Buzdar was also present in the meeting.
